titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require Members to sign an oath of secrecy before receiving access to classified information.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H1076)

bill.summary: 3/3/1994--Introduced. Amends rule XLVIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit a Member of the House (including the Resident Commissioner from Puerto Rico and any Delegate to the House) from having access to any classified information unless and until a copy of a specified oath of secrecy has been signed by that Member and has been published in the Congressional Record.
